text: Sadio Ba (born 24 January 1973) is a retired Belgian football player and currently football coach. He played as a right midfielder. Ba previously played with K.V.C. Westerlo for several seasons in the Belgian First Division. ==References== ==External links== * Profile and stats - Lokeren * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:K.S.C. title: Sadio Ba
